alert.note: Alert for Barry; Eaton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 10:52PM EDT until July 12 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barry County in southwestern Michigan... Eaton County in south central Michigan... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1052 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hastings, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lansing... Charlotte... Hastings... Eaton Rapids... Grand Ledge... Potterville... Nashville... Bellevue... Freeport... Edgemont Park... Assyria... Kalamo... Olivet... Brookfield... Dimondale... Vermontville... Sunfield... Mulliken... Waverly... Woodland... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for south central and southwestern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for south central and southwestern Michigan.
